title: Is anyone else having connection issues. (Sydney connection issues)
body:
I ran a few ping tests n stuff, and for what ever reason if I tried to connect to sydney for the tests I would get massive MS / PING.

anyone having some weird issues?

replies.body: i just finished a game where i was fluctuation to 300 and back. But my net is garbo so I assume its just me most the time
I think construction is being done in sydney I don't know.
